name: Drama Genre
description: Character-driven emotional storytelling with realistic conflicts and human relationships

prompt.base: Cinematic drama style, emotional depth, character-focused composition, realistic lighting, natural color grading, intimate framing, authentic human expressions, subtle emotional nuances, grounded in reality
prompt.positive: dramatic lighting, emotional atmosphere, character depth, realistic textures, natural skin tones, authentic expressions, intimate moments, subtle gestures, meaningful glances, emotional weight, dramatic tension, human connection
prompt.negative: over-dramatic, melodramatic, artificial emotions, exaggerated expressions, unrealistic scenarios, fantasy elements, action sequences, comedy elements, superficial characters

technical.color_palette: Muted, naturalistic tones with emotional color grading
technical.lighting: Soft, natural lighting with dramatic shadows for emotional emphasis
technical.composition: Close-ups and medium shots to capture emotional nuances

variations.name: Family Drama
variations.modifier: family dynamics, generational conflict, domestic settings, warm lighting, nostalgic atmosphere

variations.name: Psychological Drama
variations.modifier: internal conflict, mental state visualization, subjective camera work, moody lighting, introspective atmosphere

variations.name: Social Drama
variations.modifier: societal issues, cultural context, diverse settings, documentary-style realism, authentic environments

examples: A middle-aged woman sitting alone at a kitchen table, soft window light illuminating her contemplative expression, muted color palette, emotional depth
Two characters in intense conversation, shallow depth of field, natural lighting, authentic emotions, dramatic tension in their body language
